mapper.select: select r.id id, u.name userName, d.name doctorName, room.name roomName, description, state, date from t_record r left JOIN t_user u on (r.uid = u.id) left join t_doctor d on (r.did = d.id) left JOIN t_room room on (d.rid = room.id) where r.did=#{did}
select t_doctor.id id, account, password, t_doctor.name name, sex, age, t_room.name roomName from t_doctor left join t_room on (t_doctor.rid=t_room.id) where t_doctor.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_doctor set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, age=#{age} where id=#{id}
